page.title: 01INTRODUCING HUMSHAUGH
page.content: HUMSHAUGH, NORTHUMBERLAND IS AN AGRICULTURAL AREA 5 MILES FROM HEXHAM. THERE IS A{POPULATION}OF (APPROX) 300 PEOPLE, THE POSTCODE IS NE46, DIALLING CODE IS 0434-81 AND EARLY CLOSING DAY IS THURSDAY. CORBRIDGE IS 9 MILES AWAY, NEWCASTLE 25, LONDON 295 AND EDINBURGH 100 MILES. THERE IS A METHODIST CHURCH, CHURCH OF ENGLAND, VILLAGE HALL AND A CLINIC RUN BY A 3 DOCTOR PRACTICE. THE HEXHAM COUNCIL ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR REFUSE COLLECTION EACH WEEK. IN AN{EMERGENCY}A 999 TELEPHONE CALL WILL CONNECT TO POLICE HEADQUARTERS IN MORPETH AND BRING A MOBILE UNIT FROM HEXHAM. CALLS FOR AMBULANCE OR FIRE WILL BRING A RESPONSE FROM HEXHAM. THERE IS A DAILY 2 HOURLY BUS SERVICE FROM 8.00 A.M. UNTI.L 9.00 P.M. THE MAJORITY OF FAMILIES HAVE A{TELEPHONE}AND THERE IS A TWICE DAILY POSTAL DELIVERY.
